name: vsts-heroku-cli-task
description: Run a Heroku CLI command as a task
author: Sean Sobey

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The [command](https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/heroku-cli-commands) and arguments which will be passed to Heroku CLI for execution.

If your arguments contain double quotes ("), escape them with a slash (\), and surround the escaped string with double quotes (").

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: An valid API Key that represents a valid app contributor.
